title: Yulisar Khiat Buy Shares of PT Medikaloka Hermina Tbk
body: Yulisar Khiat acquired 11,274,200 shares of PT Medikaloka Hermina Tbk (HEAL.JK) at IDR 1,387 per share for investment purposes. This transaction increases Khiat's total holding from 975,554,966 to 986,829,166 shares, reflecting a positive net change in ownership.

title: Dana Pensiun Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jateng Sell Shares of PT Asuransi Digital Bersama Tbk
body: Dana Pensiun Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jateng sold 8,290,000 shares of PT Asuransi Digital Bersama Tbk for IDR 120 per share. This transaction reduces their holding from 314,135,000 shares to 305,845,000 shares, a decrease of 8,290,000 shares. The stated purpose of the transaction is investment. This sell-off may indicate a shift in the pension fund's investment strategy or portfolio reallocation.

title: Green City Sg Pte Ltd sell Shares of PT Bangun Karya Perkasa Jaya Tbk
body: Green City Sg Pte Ltd has sold 80,000,000 shares of PT Bangun Karya Perkasa Jaya Tbk. The transaction resulted in a decrease in their holdings from 682,207,800 to 602,207,800 shares. The stated purpose of the transaction was for investment. This sale represents a significant change in Green City Sg Pte Ltd's stake in KRYA.JK.
company_name: PT Bangun Karya Perkasa Jaya Tbk

title: Suhendra Prawira Widjaja buy Shares of PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk
body: Suhendra Prawira Widjaja acquired 550,400 shares of PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk for IDR 1,440 per share. This transaction, for business purposes, increases his total holding from 126,051,060 shares to 126,601,460 shares. The acquisition represents a minor increase in his stake within the company.
company_name: PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk

title: PT Bayan Resources Tbk Buy Shares of Bayan Resources Tbk
body: On January 2, 2026, PT Bayan Resources Tbk acquired 7,200 shares of its own company at IDR 16,197 per share, for a total transaction value of IDR 116,618,400. This purchase increases the company's treasury stock. The transaction results in a net increase of 7,200 shares held by the company, bringing the total holdings to 13,406,647,670 shares. The purpose stated is investment.

title: Jemmy Kurniawan Sell Shares of PT Hetzer Medical Indonesia Tbk
body: Jemmy Kurniawan divested 7,390,000 shares of PT Hetzer Medical Indonesia Tbk (MEDS.JK). The transactions occurred on January 2, 2026, at prices of IDR 71.0 and IDR 72.0 per share. Following the sale, Jemmy Kurniawan's holding decreased from 989,500,000 shares to 982,110,000 shares, a reduction of 7,390,000 shares. This divestment represents a strategic move by the shareholder.

title: Green City Sg Pte Ltd Sell Shares of PT Bangun Karya Perkasa Jaya Tbk
body: Green City Sg Pte Ltd sold 80,000,000 shares of PT Bangun Karya Perkasa Jaya Tbk (KRYA.JK) at IDR 150 per share. This transaction reduces their holding from 682,207,800 to 602,207,800 shares. The stated purpose is 'Investment'.
company_name: PT Bangun Karya Perkasa Jaya Tbk

title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Buy Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher acquired 220,400 shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) through investment. The transactions occurred on January 5, 2026, at prices of IDR 1,845 and IDR 1,830 per share. Following the purchase, Dannacher's total holdings increased from 201,523,622 to 201,744,022 shares.

title: Tan Yu Yeh Buy Shares of PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk
body: Tan Yu Yeh acquired 400,000 shares of PT Daya Intiguna Yasa Tbk for investment purposes. The transaction occurred at IDR 1,000 per share, totaling IDR 400,000,000. This purchase increases Tan Yu Yeh's holding from 12,595,186,100 shares to 12,595,586,100 shares, representing a marginal increase in ownership.

title: Henky Sulistyo Others Shares of PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk
body: Henky Sulistyo acquired 60,600 shares of PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk (BNGA.JK) through an 'others' transaction on January 2, 2026, at an average price of IDR 1,770 per share. This acquisition increased his total holdings from 243,700 to 304,300 shares. The purpose stated is the implementation of the MRT program. This transaction represents a direct increase in Henky Sulistyo's stake in the company.

title: Oki Widjaja Buy Shares of PT Galva Technologies Tbk
body: Oki Widjaja acquired 138,700 shares of PT Galva Technologies Tbk (GLVA.JK) at IDR 422 per share, totaling IDR 58,511,400. This purchase increases his total holdings from 36,877,700 to 37,016,400 shares. The stated purpose is investment. This transaction represents a minor increase in Oki Widjaja's stake in the company.

title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Buy Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher acquired 1,240,500 shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) in a series of transactions between December 30, 2025, and January 2, 2026, at prices ranging from IDR 1,760 to IDR 1,970 per share. This purchase increases his total holdings from 200,283,122 to 201,523,622 shares. The transaction is classified as an investment.

title: Ika Kusuma Putri B Buys Shares of PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk
body: Ika Kusuma Putri B acquired 149 shares of PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk for investment purposes. The transaction, executed at IDR 655.0 per share, increased her holdings from 0 to 149 shares. This marks her initial direct investment in the company.

title: Sabana Prawira Widjaja Buys Shares of PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk
body: Sabana Prawira Widjaja acquired 700,000 shares of PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk (ULTJ.JK) for IDR 1440 per share, totaling IDR 1,008,000,000. This transaction increases his total holding from 5,527,219,300 to 5,527,919,300 shares. The stated purpose is 'Business'.
company_name: PT Ultrajaya Milk Industry & Trading Company Tbk

title: Haryanto Sofian Buys Shares of Perdana Karya Perkasa Tbk
body: Haryanto Sofian acquired 50,000 shares of Perdana Karya Perkasa Tbk (PKPK.JK) through open market transactions on January 2, 2026, for an average price of approximately IDR 1,399.8 per share. This purchase increases his total holdings to 2,149,200 shares from a previous 2,099,200 shares. The stated purpose for this transaction is investment. This acquisition represents a minor increase in his stake in the company.

title: Ade Irawan buy 2,546,300 Shares of PT Sinar Terang Mandiri Tbk
body: Ade Irawan acquired 2,546,300 shares of PT Sinar Terang Mandiri Tbk (MINE.JK) for investment purposes. The transaction, executed on January 2, 2026, at IDR 450 per share, marks Ade Irawan's initial stake in the company, with holdings increasing from 0 to 2,546,300 shares. This purchase represents a new direct ownership in MINE.JK.

title: Buana Graha Utama Buy Shares of Multi Indocitra Tbk
body: Buana Graha Utama acquired 100,000 shares of Multi Indocitra Tbk for IDR 570 per share, totaling IDR 57,000,000. This investment increases Buana Graha Utama's holding from 287,146,518 shares to 287,246,518 shares, representing a minor increase in its stake in the company.

title: Saleh Buy Shares of Total Bangun Persada Tbk
body: Saleh acquired 200,000 shares of Total Bangun Persada Tbk (TOTL.JK) on January 2, 2026, for IDR 1,005 per share, totaling IDR 201,000,000. This personal transaction increased his holding from 80,888 shares to 82,888 shares. The purchase represents a minor addition to his stake in the company.

title: Dewi Irianty Wijaya Sell Shares of PT Formosa Ingredient Factory Tbk
body: Dewi Irianty Wijaya sold a total of 3,613,600 shares of PT Formosa Ingredient Factory Tbk. The transactions occurred on December 29, 2025, with individual sale prices ranging from IDR 164.0 to IDR 192.0 per share. Following these sales, her total holdings decreased from 67,423,900 shares to 63,810,300 shares. The purpose of the transaction was not specified. This represents a reduction in her stake in the company.

title: Infiniti Wahana Buy Shares of Steady Safe Tbk
body: Infiniti Wahana acquired 150,000 shares of Steady Safe Tbk for a total of IDR 60,020,000, averaging IDR 400.13 per share. This transaction increases Infiniti Wahana's total holding to 464,309,613 shares. The purchase was made for investment purposes and signifies continued confidence in the company.

title: Saka Industrial Arjaya Buys Shares of PT Mega Manunggal Property Tbk
body: Saka Industrial Arjaya acquired 53,481,387 shares of PT Mega Manunggal Property Tbk for IDR 580 per share, totaling IDR 310,200,044,600. This transaction increases Saka Industrial Arjaya's stake from 5,764,371,329 shares to 6,299,185,199 shares. The stated purpose is investment, signifying a growing commitment by Saka Industrial Arjaya in MMLP.
